main event: A UFO was observed in Nakajori Village, Japan between 1946 and 1950.
interesting points: The UFO changed color from pale white to yellow red,The observation lasted only 2-3/4 seconds, It was seen at an altitude of 350-600 meters, The site reported a sound like thunder 1-3 minutes after the object disappeared, The report indicates that the case is not in sic.
